document.full_text: the perjury case against barry bonds is built on testimony from enemies of the home run king who cut deals with the government, defense attorneys said on thursday in closing arguments at the slugger's trial.
document.title: evidence against bonds from enemies, defense says
lines_and_colors: the perjury case against barry bonds is built on testimony from enemies of the home run king who cut deals with the government, defense attorneys said on thursday in closing arguments at the slugger's trial.
